name: main.css
text_content:
FILE: resources/styles/main.css
TYPE: CSS
DESCRIPTION: This file contains the main style definitions for the Graphical User Interface (GUI) in PySide6. It defines colors, fonts, sizes, and other visual elements that are used throughout the application.

Style should use modern fonts.
Dark background.
Futuristic.

Elements: 

title
button
panel
textbox

INTERFACE: none
USES: none
